title: Tripout.co
description: Tripout.co is a travel agency that helps you plan any kind of trip, short weekend holiday, or a vacation, while helping you save the money needed to pay the trip fees.

title: CivicTrack
description: CivicTrack is an open database platform designed to promote political transparency in Africa, focusing on Nigerian politicians.

title: StatEase
description: A user-friendly statistics app for descriptive analysis, data visualizations, and inferential statistics

title: LevelUp Recyclers
description: A website developed to support waste management efforts, combining efficiency with an eco-conscious design.

title: EkoStudy
description: EkoStudy is an online learning platform for students in tertiary institutions which houses resources that are easy to understand and contain only the essentials needed for great performance in their academics.

title: EduConnect
description: A platform for students to ask questions and to answer questions for improvements in their academics through aid from more knowledgeable people such as: class mates, teachers, mentors, e.t.c

title: Silent Note Passing Protocol (SNPP)
description: A light-weight web messaging application for passing of notes without talking.

title: NodeFall
description: NodeFall is a game-hosting platform that allows users to host games on their servers
